definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: This narrow highway should be broadened.
sentences.chinese: 这条狭窄的公路应该加宽。

sentences.english: The broadening of emission region is predicted.
sentences.chinese: 理论上预言发光区将随形成时间加宽。

sentences.english: They have broadened out the avenue considerably.
sentences.chinese: 他们把这条马路加宽了不少。

sentences.english: Last year the highway was redesigned to broaden the curves and improve roadway visibility.
sentences.chinese: 去年高速公路进行了改造，加宽了弯道并改善了视野。

sentences.english: The news wismost the extended width is send out to another country.
sentences.chinese: 宽度加宽的音尘被播送到国外。

sentences.english: Income distribution remains highly unequal but opportunities are widening.
sentences.chinese: 所得分配仍高度不平均，但是机会正在加宽。

sentences.english: The historical retrospect of physical mechanisms of spectral lines broadening in stars is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文对引起恒星光谱线加宽的物理机制作了回顾。

sentences.english: Carried proudly, it gradually widens, blending smoothly into the body.
sentences.chinese: 骄傲地昂起，向肩部逐渐加宽，平滑地与肩部结合。

sentences.english: Theory of Stark effect modulation with Doppler broadening is analyzed by the semiclassical theory.
sentences.chinese: 用半经典理论分析了含多勒普加宽的斯塔克效应调制。

sentences.english: Our company can increase the width and height of the special press according to the requirement of the user.
sentences.chinese: 本公司可根据用户的要求制造加宽加高的专用压机。

sentences.english: They decided to widen out the river to avoid the flooding.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定加宽河流以防洪水泛滥。

sentences.english: This widened street is three times the length of that one.
sentences.chinese: 这条加宽的街道其长度是另一条街的三倍。

sentences.english: So it is necessary to seek new theories to explain the spectral lines broadening of stars.
sentences.chinese: 这样，寻求新的理论解释恒星光谱线的加宽成为必要。

sentences.english: This reduces gain but widens the amplifier's passband .
sentences.chinese: 这方法降低了增益，但加宽了放大器的通频带。

sentences.english: The blended wing's widened fuselage will make for amphitheater-like seating, with long, wide rows.
sentences.chinese: 加宽的机身将被如圆形剧场一般放置长而宽的座椅。

definition: a support/to raise/to bolster/to jack up
